TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 列表视图控件，该控件显示可用四种不同视图之一显示的项集合。

span.span: Represents a Windows list view control, which displays a collection of items that can be displayed using one of four different views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件使你可以显示的项文本和图标来标识的项的类型，（可选） 使用的项的列表。A control allows you to display a list of items with item text and, optionally, an icon to identify the type of item. 例如，Windows 资源管理器的文件列表中是类似的外观与控件。For example, the Windows Explorer list of files is similar in appearance to a control. 它显示的文件和文件夹的树中当前选定的列表。It displays a list of the files and folders currently selected in the tree. 每个文件和文件夹显示以帮助识别文件或文件夹的类型与其关联的图标。Each file and folder displays an icon associated with it to help identify the type of file or folder. 类表示中的项控件。The class represents an item within a control. 可以在五种不同视图之一显示列表中显示的项。The items that are displayed in the list can be shown in one of five different views. 作为大图标、 小图标，或垂直列表中的小图标，可以显示项。Items can be displayed as large icons, as small icons, or as small icons in a vertical list. 项也可以具有子项，其中包含与父项相关的信息。Items can also have subitems which contain information that is related to the parent item. 详细信息视图，可标识要显示在子项中的信息的列标题以网格显示项及其子项。The details view allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 磁贴视图中，有一定的限制如下所述，可以为包含大图标旁边的文本信息的磁贴显示项及其子项。The tile view, which has limited availability as described below, allows you to display the item and its subitems as a tile that contains a large icon next to the textual information. 支持单个或多个所选内容。 supports single or multiple selection. 多重选择功能允许用户的方式类似于的项列表中选择控件。The multiple selection feature lets the user select from a list of items in a way similar to a control. 此外，用户可以激活所选的项目来执行的任务。Additionally, the user can activate selected items to perform a task. 例如，可以使用控件来显示的应用程序可以打开并使用的文件列表。For example, you could use a control to display a list of files that the application can then open and utilize. 用户可以选择要打开，然后双击它们来激活项，并在应用程序中打开文件的文件。The user can select the files to open and then double-click them to activate the items and open the files in the application. 还可以显示复选框，使用属性，以允许用户以检查他们想要对执行操作的项。The can also display check boxes, using the property, to allow the user to check the items that they want to perform an action on. 你可以使用各种不同的方式的控制。You can use the control in a variety of ways. 控件可以用于显示从应用程序、 数据库或文本文件的信息。The control can be used to display information from an application, a database, or a text file. 还可用于获取从用户，例如选择要处理的文件集的信息。The can also be used to obtain information from the user, such as selecting a set of files to process. 提供了大量提供灵活地外观和行为的属性。 provides a large number of properties that provide flexibility in appearance and behavior. 属性允许您更改项的显示方式。The property allows you to change the way in which items are displayed. ， ，和属性允许你指定对象包含的项，和的情况下显示的图像，是对应的复选框时，所显示属性设置为`true`。The , , and properties allow you to specify the objects that contain the images displayed for items and, in the case of the , the check boxes that are displayed when the property is set to `true`. 若要确定选中了哪些项，可以使用属性来访问集合。To determine which items are checked, you can use the property to access the collection. 属性可以访问，它用于存储的列标头时，所显示的控件属性设置为。The property allows access to the , which stores the column headers that are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 添加项目，从删除通过属性。Items are added and removed from the through the property. 属性允许你访问的控件，它提供用于操作控件中的项的方法。The property allows you to access the of the control, which provides methods for manipulating the items in the control. 如果你想要允许用户编辑项的文本，则可以使用属性。If you want to allow the user to edit the text of an item, you can use the property. 当控件包含大量的项时，它通常是便于用户若要查看在已排序的列表。When your control contains a large number of items, it is often easier for the user to see them in a sorted list. 你可以使用属性以按字母顺序的项进行排序。You can use the property to sort the items alphabetically. 你可以完全自定义的外观控件。You can also completely customize the appearance of a control. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性`true`并处理一个或多个以下事件： ， ， 。To do this, set the property to `true` and handle one or more of the following events: , , . 许多属性的控件时使用的控件属性设置为。Many of the properties of the control are used when the property of the control is set to . 属性允许的用户你控件在运行时重新配置的列的顺序。The property allows the user of your control to reconfigure the order of columns at run time. 属性使项和选择而不是不仅仅是项及其子项。The property allows an item and its subitems to be selected instead of just the item. 若要在以标识中项及其子项的边界的详细信息视图中显示网格线，你可以使用属性。To display gridlines in the details view to identify the boundaries of items and subitems in the , you can use the property. 属性允许你指定的列标题以显示类型。The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display. A控件可以操作在虚拟模式下，其中对象动态生成，而不是存储在集合。A control can operate in virtual mode, where objects are generated dynamically instead of being stored in the collection. 这可用于处理非常大的列表或列表频繁更改其内容。This can be useful for dealing with very large lists or lists whose contents frequently change. 若要启用虚拟模式，设置属性`true`并处理， ，和事件。To enable Virtual mode, set the property to `true` and handle the , , and events. 除了可用于许多属性控制，一些方法和事件，你的应用程序可以将用于为提供其他功能。In addition to the many properties that are available for a control, there are methods and events that your application can use to provide additional capabilities to the . 和方法使您能够提高性能，当你将添加到多个项通过防止控件重新绘制某一项添加每次。The and methods allow you to improve performance when you add many items to a by preventing the control from repainting every time that an item is added. 如果你控件显示的项及其子项，你可能想要在用户右击子项下提供功能。If your control is displaying items and subitems, you may want to provide functionality when the user right-clicks a subitem. 若要确定其被单击的项，可以使用方法。To determine the item whose subitem is being clicked, you can use the method. 时执行验证的项在用户已编辑了它们后，你可能想要向用户若要更改显示的特定项。When performing validation of the items after the user has edited them, you may want to display a specific item to the user to change. 可以调用方法来确保特定的项在控件的可见区域。The method can be called to ensure that the specific item is in the visible area of the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，你可以执行任务，例如验证正在编辑之前和之后更改通过创建的事件处理程序的文本的文本和事件。If the property set to `true`, you can perform tasks such as validating the text being edited before and after the text changed by creating an event handler for the and events. 若要执行任务，例如打开文件或显示对话框可编辑中显示的项，你可以创建的事件处理程序事件。To perform tasks such as opening a file or displaying a dialog box to edit an item displayed in a , you can create an event handler for the event. 如果你允许用户中的项进行排序当他们单击列标题，可以创建的事件处理程序事件以执行排序。If you allow the user to sort the items in a when they click a column header, you can create an event handler for the event to perform the sorting. 当属性设置为`true`，你可以确定项的复选状态的更改发生时通过处理事件。When the property is set to `true`, you can determine when a change in an item's check state has occurred by handling the event. 您还可以设置的背景图像与属性。You can also set a background image for the with the property. 你的应用程序必须具有上其`Main`方法以正确显示的背景图像控件。Your application must have the on its `Main` method to correctly display the background image for the control. 此外，如果具有背景图像的控件承载在 Internet Explorer 中，指定为一个依赖程序集应用程序清单文件中以确保显示的属性的背景图像的 comctl32.dll 版本 6.0。In addition, if a control with a background image is hosted in Internet Explorer, specify comctl32.dll version 6.0 as a dependent assembly in the application manifest file to ensure the background image is property displayed. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性控件中的光标外观产生任何影响[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本 1.1 和更早版本。Setting the property for a control has no affect on the appearance of the cursor in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versions 1.1 and earlier. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 提供增强的三个功能控制在你的应用程序调用方法： 平铺视图、 分组和插入标记。Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 provide three features that enhance the control when your application calls the method: tile view, grouping, and the insertion mark. 磁贴视图可以通过显示大图标旁边的项和子项的文本来平衡图形和文本信息。The tile view lets you balance graphical and textual information by displaying item and subitem text next to large icons. 设置属性若要启用此行为。Set the property to to enable this behavior. 分组功能允许您以可视方式分组到相关的类别的项。The grouping feature lets you visually group items into related categories. 使用属性来添加对象添加到控制当你想要启用此功能。Use the property to add objects to the control when you want to enable this feature. 若要暂时禁用该功能，设置属性`false`。To temporarily disable the feature, set the property to `false`. 插入标记功能可以提供拖放项重新定位的视觉反馈指示放置位置。The insertion mark feature lets you provide drag-and-drop item repositioning with visual feedback to indicate drop locations. 使用对象通过检索属性显示插入标记。Use the object retrieved through the property to display the insertion mark. 这些功能是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 中可用。These features are available only under Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. 在早期的操作系统上与这些功能相关的代码不起、 磁贴视图显示大图标视图中，为和不显示插入标记和组。On earlier operating systems, the code that relate to these features has no effect, the tile view appears as the large icon view, and the insertion mark and groups do not display. 在某些情况下，你可能想要编写代码来确定这些功能是否可用，并提供备用功能，它们都不可用时。In some cases, you might want to include code that determines whether these features are available, and provide alternate functionality when they are unavailable. 这些功能由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。These features are provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. 下表显示的一些成员以及它们是在中有效的视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| | 属性 property| 或 or | |事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 获取或设置用户激活某个项必须要执行的操作的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定用户将如何激活中的项控件。The property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the control. 激活中的项不同于只需选择一个项。Activating an item in a differs from just selecting an item. 当激活某个项时，通常的事件处理程序中执行某个操作事件。When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the event. 例如，在激活一项时你可能打开文件或显示一个对话框框，让要对其进行编辑的项。For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited. 通常情况下，要激活它的用户双击一个项。Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it. 如果属性设置为，单击项一次激活它。If the property is set to , clicking the item one time activates it. 设置属性与标准双击不同，因为两次单击可以具有任何它们之间的持续时间。Setting the property to differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为或，标签编辑将不允许的值无论属性。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 成员之一。

span.span: The value specified is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时在用户完成修改项的文本。The event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 用户键入项的新字符串传递给该事件，并且事件处理程序可以拒绝此更改。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件处理程序拒绝更改，文本将恢复为文本中，因为其用户开始编辑项之前。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. > [!NOTE] > 因为事件发生之前标签编辑也会提交，调用处理程序中为此事件的方法将排序使用的原始值的项。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. 为了使事件被引发属性控件必须设置为`true`。In order for the event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件以执行任务之前用户编辑项的文本。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件将限制为在字母表中的字符的新编辑的标签。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用类来获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符表示数字的 ASCII 代码之间处于，新的标签不能应用于项中。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例需要你已创建了控件在窗体和添加到它的项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求你已连接到事件处理程序的代码示例中定义的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用类，你的文件必须包含命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值设置属性无任何效果，除非属性设置为。Setting the value of the property has no effect unless the property is set to . 可以使用此属性以允许用户在运行时重新列定位控件中。You can use this property to allow users to reposition columns in the control at run time. 当属性设置为`true`，用户可以放置控件以满足你的应用程序在其需求的方式显示项及其子项中的列。When the property is set to `true`, users can position the columns in the control to display the item and its subitems in a way that meets their needs within your application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅有用属性设置为或。The method is only useful when the property is set to or . 调用此版本的方法排列基于值的项属性。Calling this version of the method arranges the items based on the value of the property. 要使项对齐基于一个值，不同于属性，使用其他版本的方法。To cause the items to be aligned based on a value that differs from that of the property, use the other version of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时在用户开始修改项的文本。The event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户无法编辑文本。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text. 你可以使用此事件来防止用户编辑中的特定项控件。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果属性控件设置为`false`、不会引发事件; 若要编辑项标签的所有用户尝试将自动被都拒绝。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件以及如何使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体控件名为`ListView1`并且填充了至少三个项。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least three items. 请确保在示例中的事件处理程序与其事件相关联。Ensure the event handler in the example is associated with its event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到多个项的首选的方法是使用方法(通过访问属性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件某一项添加每次。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the every time that an item is added. 当你已完成的任务将项添加到控件时，调用方法，以使重绘窗体。When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制大量项添加到控件时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when lots of items are being added to the control. 如果调用一次以上，必须调用的等效次数。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 上次调用直到不会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此之外，多次调用不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件，以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示如何使用和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `ListView1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您在列表中显示每个项旁的复选框。The property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list. 这使你的应用程序，以显示的项列表 (和子项如果属性设置为`View.Details`) 用户可以选择通过单击复选框。This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box. 属性提供了一个方法来选择多个项而无需使用 CTRL 键的控件。The property offers a way to select multiple items in the control without using the CTRL key. 具体取决于你的应用程序，使用复选框来选择项，而不是标准多个选择方法可能会为用户更容易。Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user. 即使属性控件设置为`false`，仍可显示复选框，并向用户提供多重选择功能。Even if the property of the control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user. 如果你想要选择多个项还仍想要允许用户从执行你的应用程序中的某个操作的列表中选择多个项，此功能会很有用。This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application. 若要确定当已选中项，创建的事件处理程序事件。To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the event. 若要获取的签入的所有项目，使用属性来访问控件。To get all the items that are checked in the , use the property to access the for the control. 若要获取已签入的所有项的索引，使用属性。To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the , use the property. 如果中指定属性、 0 和 1 中的索引位置处图像而不是复选框显示。If an is specified in the property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 索引位置 0 处的映像显示而不是未选中的复选框，和中的索引位置 1 的映像显示而不是已选中的复选框。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性为`true`、事件发生。When you set this property to `true`, the event occurs. > > 不是复选框时，所显示属性设置为。Check boxes are not displayed when the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在用户单击中的项的详细信息视图中的列标头之一时控件 (时属性设置为)。The event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). 事件通常用于中的项进行排序使用所单击的列与列进行排序。The event is typically handled to sort the items in the using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体控件项中的列时进行手动排序控件被单击。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`实现接口执行比较。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置属性控件。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法调用事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来执行的项，基于所单击的列排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可让你自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 引发该事件时，才属性设置为`true`和属性设置为。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to . 每个列标题控件中可能发生此事件。This event can occur for each column header in the control. 所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的实现事件处理程序。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整示例，包括的实现事件处理程序，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, including the implementation of the event handler, see the reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As DrawListViewItemEventHandler

summary.span: 在绘制 并且 属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is drawn and the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可让你自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 引发该事件时，才属性设置为`true`。It is raised only when the property is set to `true`. 有关所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information about owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 事件可以针对每个发生项。The event can occur for each item. 当属性设置为、和也会发生事件。When the property is set to , the and events also occur. 在这种情况下，你可以处理事件来绘制所有项，如 background，常见的元素，并处理事件以便都绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。In this case, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制所有项控制只使用一个的两个事件，尽管这可能是不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要绘制的详细信息视图中列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 由于在基础的 Win32 控件中，一个 bug同时发生的事件当鼠标指针移过行的详细信息视图中的每一行的事件，导致的任何内容中绘制事件处理程序绘制自定义背景中绘制转移事件处理程序。Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the event occurs without accompanying events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a event handler. 请参阅中的示例额外事件发生时使每行一种解决方法的参考主题。See the example in the reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs. 备用解决方法是将所有自定义绘制代码放入事件处理程序并绘制整个项 （包括子项） 的背景时，才值为 0。An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the value is 0. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的实现事件处理程序。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. summary.span: 当绘制 的详细信息视图并且 属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the details view of a is drawn and the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可让你自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 引发该事件时，才属性设置为`true`和属性设置为。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to . 所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常出现在磁贴视图，以及详细信息视图中，但在磁贴视图中，它必须绘制的处理程序中事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 事件可以针对每个发生子项。The event can occur for each subitem. 你可以处理事件来绘制所有子项，如 background，常见的元素，并处理事件以便都绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。You can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制所有项控制只使用一个的两个事件，尽管这可能是不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要绘制的详细信息视图中列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 事件不会发生，无任何子项对象已添加到集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个的第一个子项对象表示的父项本身，并且将显示在第一列。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的实现事件处理程序。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到多个项的首选的方法是使用方法(通过访问属性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次添加一个项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added. 完成向控件添加项的任务后，请调用方法，以使重绘窗体。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制大量的项添加到控件时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the control. 如果调用一次以上，必须调用的等效次数。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 上次调用直到不会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此之外，多次调用不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件，以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示如何使用和方法。It also demonstrates using the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含名为`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `ListView1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法以确保特定的项是在内可见控件。You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the control. 中的项在执行验证时，可以调用方法，以确保失败验证项目会显示在控制选项可允许用户在项上执行更改。When performing validation on the items in a , you can call the method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the control to allow the user to perform changes on the item. 如果你想要确保项可见位于可视区域的上方控制，请调用方法将滚动控件的内容，直到它控件的可视区域中的第一个项。If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control. 如果该项是下方的可视区域控制，请调用方法将会滚动的内容控制到相应项的控件的可视区域的最后一项。If the item is below the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control. 若要确定某个项的显示区域的顶部是否位于控制，请使用属性。To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a control, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回，表示当前正在显示的聚焦框的项控件。The property returns the that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the control. 因为控件具有不与它显示的项不直接编辑区域时控件有焦点中的项显示焦点标线放置在其项文本两侧。Because a control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the control has focus, an item within the displays the focus reticle around its item text. 通常情况下，最后选择的项在控件是具有焦点的项。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 虽然项目可能显示焦点标线，但实际上它可能不是中的选定的项。Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the . 使用或属性来获取中的选定的项控件，不一定选择属性。Use the or properties to obtain the selected items in the control, the property is not necessarily selected. 你可以使用属性来确定哪一项上一次单击在控件，而不考虑所选内容状态。You can use the property to determine which item was last clicked in the control, regardless of selection state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性无任何效果，除非属性控件设置为。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 属性通常是时使用具有许多子项和它的显示项务必要能够项文本是不可见由于水平滚动的控件的内容时，将显示所选的项目。The property is typically used when a displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents. > [!NOTE] > 当设置为`true`的工具提示不会显示; 仅父级的工具提示显示。When is set to `true`, ToolTips for a will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可让你确定哪一项位于中的客户端区域的特定位置控件。The method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the control. 用户单击或右击子项时，可以使用此方法 (时属性设置为`View.Details`) 并且你想要确定哪一项拥有在用户单击鼠标时根据鼠标坐标被单击该子项.You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse. > [!NOTE] > 当属性值是`false`，仅当指定的位置是否在父项 （当控件处于详细信息模式，将显示在第一列） 的边界内时，此方法返回一个项。When the property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode). 必须设置属性`true`若要使用此方法，给定位置的边界内的子项中检索项。You must set the property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem. 你还可以使用方法来检索有关特定位置处的项的详细的信息。You can also use the method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location. 若要执行拖放项内的重定位，你可能想要使用方法而不是方法。To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a , you might want to use the method rather than the method. 方法找到最近的项而不考虑鼠标指针所在的位置。The method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located. 方法，另一方面，返回`null`如果在指定的位置没有项。The method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location. > [!NOTE] > 类支持仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上，当你的应用程序调用方法。The class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将和控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过设置初始化和属性使用和枚举，分别。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填入示例目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Samples directory. 时处理，方法在中使用控件的事件，以确定是否选择了某个项。The method is used in when handling the control's event to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，事件处理程序将显示所选的文件通过设置属性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例需要位于 C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例图片目录中的 JPG 文件存在。The example requires the existence of JPG files located in the C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`InitializePictureBox`和`PopulateListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性无任何效果，除非属性控件设置为。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 属性使你可以显示线，以识别的行和列中显示控制当显示项和及其子项。The property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the control when it displays items and their subitems. 显示网格线不提供能够调整行和列大小为应用程序，如 Microsoft excel。The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does. 只有列可调整大小，如果显示列标题，通过将鼠标指针移到要调整大小的列的右侧，然后单击并拖动直到列所需的大小。Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want. 网格线功能用于控件的用户提供项和子项周围的可视边界。The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分组功能允许你创建的逻辑上相关 visual 组项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每个组由文本标题后跟一条横线和分配给该组的项组成。Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 你可以将左、 右或控件的中心标头文本对齐。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 分配给任何组控件显示每当属性设置为值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 组可帮助你查找到它们正在寻找通过将项隔离成有用的类别的项的用户。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 你可以创建任何所需的类别。You can create whatever categories you need. 一个典型方法是基于对列表进行排序的方式的项进行分组。One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted. 例如，可以按项目名称的首字母分组的项，按字母顺序或如类型或通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题的列表进行排序时的日期的子项列表进行排序时。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 资源管理器使用此类型的分组。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用分组功能，添加一个或多个对象添加到集合控件。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在中设置组标题文本和标头的对齐方式构造函数，或将其设置使用和属性。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 若要暂时禁用分组功能，设置属性`false`。To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the property to `false`. 你可以向组分配一个项，通过指定中的组构造函数，通过设置属性，或通过直接添加到项组的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项应都分配到组，才会显示它们。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项将显示在默认组中，具有标头标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 项一次只能是一个组中。An item can only be in one group at a time. 你可以更改通过设置项所属组属性在运行时或通过将其添加到另一个组，这会自动删除它从以前的组的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. 使用组时，插入标记功能被禁用。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 这是因为分组功能通过组成员身份的项排序，而插入标记功能则用于与拖放中重新定位不排序其项的控件。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. 当你的应用程序调用时，组是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用方法。 groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上与组相关的任何代码有影响，并且组将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear. 因此，取决于分组功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 你可能想要编写代码来确定分组功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要提供替代的排序不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行时。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. 由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供分组功能。The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用分组功能，以便按的详细信息视图中的子项值组织的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题对项排序到为该列创建的组。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击相同的列标题反转组的顺序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定的类型时要显示的列标题属性控件设置为和控件具有中指定的对象.The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the property of the control is set to and the control has objects specified in the . 对象定义中显示的列控件。 objects define the columns that are displayed in the control. 每一列用于显示中每个项的子项信息。Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the . 属性允许你指定是否列标题是否可见或它们是否可见，是否将用作可单击的按钮。The property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons. 如果属性设置为，不显示列标题，尽管项及其子项的仍列中排列控件。If the property is set to , the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the control are still arranged in columns. 如果属性设置为，列标题的作用像用户可以单击来执行操作，如排序中的项的按钮控制在所单击的列作为键使用的项。If the property is set to , the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the control using the items in the clicked column as a key. 你可以在处理程序中实现此行为事件。You can implement this behavior in a handler for the event. 如果属性设置为，列标题显示，但不能单击。If the property is set to , the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示这样要选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示了如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 它还演示了，和属性。It also demonstrates the , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，用户可以指向中的项控件以选择的项目。When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the control to select the item. 可以选择多个项目 (时属性设置为 true) 通过在指向每个项时按住 CTRL 键。Multiple items can be selected (when the property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item. 你可以使用此功能为你的应用程序中选择项目的用户提供更简单的方法控件。You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the control.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，在 控件内拖动项时，该对象用来指示预期的放置位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入标记功能使您可以直观地指示拖放操作中的预期的放置位置时某一项拖动到新位置。The insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 此功能时才起作用属性设置为`true`以及何时控件不会自动对项。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自动排序属性必须设置为和属性必须设置为， ，或。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入标记功能可能不具有可见分组功能，因为通过组成员身份对项进行分组功能排列。Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 类通常在处理程序中使用或事件来更新插入标记的位置，如某一项拖动。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 处理程序中还使用它或事件以在正确的位置插入拖动的项。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 ListView 控件中显示插入标记](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md)。For more information, see and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 插入标记功能则仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用的当你的应用程序调用方法。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统中，与插入标记相关的任何代码都不会有影响，并且插入标记也不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear. 因此，取决于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly. 你可能想要编写代码来确定此功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要绕过实现拖放项重新定位时不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行的所有代码。For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入标记功能由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature. 本示例实现拖放项重新排序操作使用标准的拖动事件。This example implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序，鼠标指针的位置进行比较到中点的最近的项，然后使用结果来确定向左或向右的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. summary.span: 在激活一项时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时用户激活中的一个或多个项控件。The event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值属性，或键盘。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 从事件处理程序中事件，你可以引用或属性访问集合中的选定项以确定正在激活的项。From within the event handler for the event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: Occurs when the check state of an item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为 true 顺序显示在每个项旁边的复选框控件。The property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the control. 项的复选状态更改时或当事件发生属性设置为`true`。The event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the property is set to `true`. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件以执行任务，例如更改每次签入项时的项的图标或另一个应用程序特定任务的状态控件。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗口句柄尚未创建时引发事件，事件将被延迟。If the window handle has not been created when the event is raised, the event will be delayed. （当显示窗体） 创建的窗口句柄后, 任何延迟会引发事件。Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed events will be raised. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查处理控件事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 该方法使用和属性来检索并计算选定的菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含`ListView`名为`ListView1`和`TextBox`名为`Textbox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a `ListView` named `ListView1` and a `TextBox` named `Textbox1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保事件是与在此示例中的事件处理程序相关联。Ensure that the event is associated with the event handler in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，用户能够修改项的文本，通过单击项文本以选中它，然后单击再次要放置到的标签文本的项文本编辑模式。When the property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode. 然后，用户可以修改或替换项的文本标签。The user can then modify or replace the item's text label. 你可以使用和事件以执行任务之前和之后用户编辑项的文本。You can use the and events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text. 无法修改的子项的文本，如果此属性设置为`true`。The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`. 若要更改的子项的文本，你可以在它们双击控件中的子项时向用户显示一个对话框。To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为或，标签编辑将不允许的值无论属性。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，在项文本换到下一行文本，如果需要。When the property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed. 如果文本的长度超过两个行文本，则文本将缩短。If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened. 如果用户选择的项，则显示所有项文本。If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed. 如果属性设置为`false`，所有项文本都显示在单独的行。If the property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line. 显示整个项文本时设置为`false`。The entire item text is displayed when the is set to `false`. 此属性是时才使用属性设置为或。This property is only used when the property is set to or .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定包含图标显示项目大图标时要使用的对象 (当属性设置为)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ). 控件可以接受任何图形格式控件支持时显示图标。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件并不局限于.ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次分配给属性，可以设置每个属性中控件中的相应图像的索引位置到。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 图标的大小指定。The size of the icons for the is specified by the . 因为只有一个索引可以为指定属性，中指定的对象和属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果属性设置为 0，用于小型和大型图标的图像，应保持在相同的索引位置中中指定的对象和属性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 图像指定了密钥，仍需要将映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表相同的索引位置处。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要设置显示带小图标的项时要使用 (以外的所有视图模式)，使用属性。To set the to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than ), use the property. 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定的对象，执行中的项排序控制调用方法或项目添加到列表中时。The property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a control when the method is called or when items are added to the list. 请注意，项不是自动排序其标签文本的更改时。Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes. 指定的对象必须实现的类的实例接口，具有一个方法调用。The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the interface, which has a single method called . 此属性可用于提供自定义排序，例如，在详细信息视图中单击列标题。You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view. 若要执行此操作，创建一个类以实现接口，并提供接受要作为排序依据的列的索引的构造函数。To do this, create a class that implements the interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by. 然后，你可以实现的处理程序创建使用所单击的列的索引此类的实例的事件。You can then implement a handler for the event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column. 当你将设置属性的新实例，控件进行自动排序使用指定的对象。When you set the property to the new instance, the control is automatically sorted using the specified object. 后续调用方法使用相同的对象。Subsequent calls to the method use the same object. > [!NOTE] > 当你设置的值属性，自动调用方法。When you set the value of the property, the method is called automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体控件项中的列时进行手动排序控件被单击。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`实现接口执行比较。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置属性控件。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法调用事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来执行的项，基于所单击的列排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.

value.span: 如果可以一次选择控件中的多个项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，可以在中选择多个项控件。When the property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the control. 若要选择多个项，用户必须按住 CTRL 键同时单击选择的项。To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select. 通过单击选择的第一个项，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击以选择的最后一项，则可以选择连续的项。Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select. 你可以使用多重选择功能选择中的多个项目控制，执行对选择的所有项的操作。You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the control and perform an operation on all the items selected. 例如，用户可以选择多个项，然后右键单击选定的项以显示显示一组可以对所选项目执行的任务的快捷菜单。For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items. 若要确定哪些项选择中控制，请使用属性。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property. 属性允许你访问包含选定项的列表。The property allows you to access the that contains a list of the selected items. 如果您希望的索引位置中而不是项，你可以使用属性来访问。If you want the index positions in the instead of the items, you can use the property to access the . 如果您不想要允许进行多选中的，但仍想要为用户提供一种选择，可以通过设置显示复选框的多个项目的方法属性`true`。If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the , yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示这样要选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示了如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件将限制为在字母表中的字符的新编辑的标签。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用类来获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符表示数字的 ASCII 代码之间处于，新的标签不能应用于项中。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例需要你已创建了控件在窗体和添加到它的项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求你已连接到事件处理程序的代码示例中定义的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用类，你的文件必须包含命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OwnerDraw { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是由操作系统绘制，还是由您提供的代码绘制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.

value.span: 如果 控件由您提供的代码绘制，则为 ；如果 控件由操作系统绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the control is drawn by code that you provide; if the control is drawn by the operating system.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通常由操作系统绘制控件。A control is normally drawn by the operating system. 若要自定义的外观项、 子项和列标题集属性`true`和提供的一个或多个以下事件处理程序： ， ， 。In order to customize the appearance of items, subitems, and column headers, set the property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: , , . 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. 当属性设置为，所有三个事件发生; 否则为仅事件发生。When the property is set to , all three events occur; otherwise, only the event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常出现在磁贴视图，以及详细信息视图中，但在磁贴视图中，它必须绘制的处理程序中事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 事件不会发生，无任何子项对象已添加到集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个的第一个子项对象表示的父项本身，并且将显示在第一列。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 在详细信息视图中，你可以处理事件来绘制所有子项，如 background，常见的元素，并处理事件以便都绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。In the details view, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制所有项控制只使用一个的两个事件，尽管这可能是不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要绘制的详细信息视图中列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 为了避免在所有者绘制，重写时，图形闪烁问题控件并设置属性`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供自定义方式绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 与负值子项具有红色的前景色和背景为黑色。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 处理程序事件绘制的文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 处理程序事件绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. A组件提供一种方法的详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，仅引发事件。In the list view, only the event is raised. 在这种情况下，文本和背景均在事件处理程序。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`、显示垂直滚动条用于项的数目超过控件的客户端区域的大小。When this property is set to `true`, the displays a vertical scroll bar to use when the number of items exceeds the size of the client area of the control. 你可以使用此属性以确保用户可以访问所提供的所有项控件。You can use this property to ensure that the user can access all items that are available in the control. > [!NOTE] > 在新版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]之前 2.0 版中，列标题不正确绘制时将此属性设置为`false`和调整大小以使其更大的控件。In versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0, the column headers were not painted correctly when setting this property to `false` and resizing the control to make it larger. 若要解决此问题，请将此属性设置为`true`中事件处理程序并将其设置回`false`中事件处理程序。To work around this issue, set this property to `true` in a event handler and set it back to `false` in a event handler.

summary.span: 当 集合更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合每当更改属性更改。The collection changes whenever the property of a changes. 属性更改可以以编程方式发生，或当用户选择某一项或清除选择的项。The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item. 当用户选择一个项，而无需按 ctrl 键，可执行多个所选内容时，控件首先会清除以前的选择。When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection. 在这种情况下，为每个以前选择的项的一次，一次新选定的项，将发生此事件。In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item. 若要确定哪些项选择中控制，请使用属性来访问。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property to access the . 你可以创建的事件处理程序此事件以对中的选定项的更改时执行任务控件。You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，事件，成员和类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, event, members, and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联事件This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将不会包含任何索引，如果此属性访问之前创建句柄，这通常发生时以窗体显示为最初加载。The property will not contain any indexes if the property is accessed before the handle is created, which typically occurs when the is initially loaded for display in the form. 你可以检查以查看是否与创建句柄属性。You can check to see if the handle is created with the property. 当属性设置为`true`，此属性返回一个包含在中选择的所有项的索引的集合。When the property is set to `true`, this property returns a collection containing the indexes of all items that are selected in the . 对于单选择，此属性返回一个包含单个元素包含在唯一选定的项的索引的集合。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the . 可以使用集合中的项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see . 如果你想要获取在中选择的项的集合控件，而不是选择，使用的项的索引位置属性。If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are selected in the control, instead of the index positions of the items that are selected, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和成员和类。The following code example demonstrates using the , , and members and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要事件处理程序是与正确关联事件。This example requires the event handler is correctly associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 分配给任何组控件显示每当属性设置为值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 分组功能允许你创建的逻辑上相关 visual 组在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上的项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. 若要启用此功能，你的应用程序必须调用方法。To enable this feature, your application must call the method. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，当项在控件中显示为小图标时使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when displaying items as small icons in the control.

value.span: ，包含将 属性设置为 时要使用的图标。

span.span: An that contains the icons to use when the property is set to .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定包含图标显示带小图标的项时要使用的对象 (当属性设置为任何值)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the property is set to any value other than ). 控件可以接受任何图形格式控件支持时显示图标。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件并不局限于.ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次分配给属性，可以设置每个属性中控件中的相应图像的索引位置到。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 图标的大小指定属性。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property. 因为只有一个索引可以为指定属性，中指定的对象和属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果属性设置为 0，用于小型和大型图标的图像，应保持在相同的索引位置中中指定的对象和属性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 图像指定了密钥，仍需要将映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表相同的索引位置处。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要设置显示大图标的项目时要使用 (当属性设置为)，使用属性。To set the to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ), use the property. 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 对列表视图的项进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the items of the list view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常项进行排序使用属性，用于对基于项文本的项排序。Typically items are sorted using the property, which sorts items based on the item text. 若要自定义排序顺序，必须编写一个实现类接口，并设置该类的对象的属性。To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the interface and set the property to an object of that class. 这很有用，例如，如果你想要通过子项文本的项进行排序。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text. 有关执行手动排序的项的详细信息，请参阅示例属性。For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the property. 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，则添加项时自动排序列表。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added. 标签文本更改时，项不会自动排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::SortOrder Sorting { System::Windows::Forms::SortOrder get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::SortOrder value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中项的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the sort order for items in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定是否在中的排序项控件。The property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the control. 默认情况下，执行任何排序。By default, no sorting is performed. 当属性设置为或中的项自动按升序按字母顺序排序 (当属性设置为) 或降序按字母顺序排列 (时属性设置为)。When the property is set to or , the items in the are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ). 你可以使用此属性中显示的项自动进行排序你控件使用户更轻松地查找项，有大量的项时。You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available. 如果你想要执行你自己项的排序，而不使用属性，请使用属性结合方法。If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the property, use the property in combination with the method. 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，则自动排序列表添加项时。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added. 标签文本更改时，项不会自动排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定，其中包含要使用来表示特定于应用程序状态中的项的图像控件。The property allows you to specify an that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a control. 状态图像显示项的图标左侧。State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item. 状态图像，如 checked 和 unchecked 复选框，可用于指示应用程序定义的项状态。You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states. 状态图像是可见的所有视图中控件。State images are visible in all views of the control. 如果中指定属性和属性设置为`true`，0 和 1 中的索引位置处的映像而不是复选框显示。If an is specified in the property and the property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 索引位置 0 处的映像显示而不是未选中的复选框，和中的索引位置 1 的映像显示而不是已选中的复选框。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
