remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，用零 (0) 的索引位置的项位于顶部控件。Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the control. 如果滚动控件内容、 不同的项可以在控件的顶部。If the control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control. 此属性可用于指示或确定哪一项是可见的顶部控件。You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the control. 值属性将不始终保持不变，根据所需的顶级项在列表视图中的位置。The value of the property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view. 在中可见的项的数目控件在任何时间取决于该列表视图的高度和其包含的项的大小。The number of items visible in a control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains. 如果项超过列表视图的高度，项将继续到多个页，用户可以滚动浏览。If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through. 如果你设置的最后一页中的项的属性，项将自动滚动到视图; 但是，将设置为实际顶部的项的最后一页。If you set the property to an item in the last page of the , the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, will be set to the actual top item of the last page. 若要确保特定的项在控件的可见区域 （但不是一定在最顶部的位置），使用方法。To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the method. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性未包含任何时生效属性值是`false`。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. > > 设置此属性的版本中不支持[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]早于 2.0 版。Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重置的样式使用的对象的子项属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates resetting the style of a object's subitems through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1` and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改为中控制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 启用自定义状态图像以设置，以指示项是否选中或取消选中或处于不确定状态。Changes to the control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state. 此功能，不带[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 具有不同的行为与.NET Framework 1.1。With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1. 如果你已创建的应用程序依赖于中的行为[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1，请确保属性设置为`true`，这是默认值。If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the property is set to `true`, which is the default value. 为了充分利用自定义状态图像，请将设置到`false`。In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]设计器中，属性将设置为`false`。If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer, the property will be set to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定的一种显示控件用于显示项。The property allows you to specify the type of display the control uses to display items. 你可以设置属性，以显示与大或小图标的每个项或显示垂直列表中的项。You can set the property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list. 最丰富的选项为详细信息视图，该对话框可以查看不仅的项，但为每个项指定任何子项。The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item. 与垂直列出每个项的子项中包含列标题的列显示每个项的情况下，每个项显示在网格中。Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers. 详细信息视图是向用户显示数据库信息的理想方式。The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user. 对于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，还可以作为平衡通过显示大图标以及你选择的子项信息的图形和文本信息的磁贴中显示项。With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing. 若要启用磁贴视图，你的应用程序必须调用方法。To enable tile view, your application must call the method. 小型图像视图右侧的图标显示的图标和文本信息与每个项。The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon. 大图像视图将显示一个图标和图标下方的文本信息与每个项。The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon. 通过指定的图像列表的图标大小属性为或属性。The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the property of the for the or properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的小型和大型图标视图中，使用多个图像列表，控件，你应将放置小型和大型位于同一个映像的版本索引在其各自的图像列表的位置。If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 中的属性的大多数控制影响如何在不同的视图的行为，或显示。Most of the properties in the control affect how the different views behave or are displayed. 一些会影响的项的视图的属性才有用属性设置为特定值，而有些则是在所有视图很有用。Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views. 例如，属性，如和时才有用属性设置为，虽然和属性可在所有视图中。For example, properties such as and are only useful when the property is set to , while the and properties are useful in all views. 下表显示的一些成员以及它们是在中有效的视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| ||除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property| 或 or | |事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | 你可以使用属性来提供应用程序中数据的不同视图或锁定的特定视图，利用该视图的优点。You can use the property to provide different views of data in your application, or to lock a specific view to utilize that view's benefits. 例如，属性通常设置为因为详细信息视图提供了多种查看在其他视图中不可用的选项。For example, the property is often set to because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views. > [!NOTE] > 如果你控件没有指定任何列标题和你设置属性、控件将不显示任何项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any items. 如果你控件没有指定任何列标题和你设置属性、控件将不显示任何子项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any subitems. 磁贴视图右侧的向左和文本信息显示大图标与每个项。The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right. 文本信息包含跟子项的项标签。The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems. 默认情况下，会显示仅的第一个子项，它对应于项的标签。By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label. 若要显示其他子项，你必须添加对象添加到集合。To display additional subitems, you must add objects to the collection. 磁贴中的每个子项对应于列标题。Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header. 若要控制显示哪些子项和它们的显示顺序，必须设置每个项的属性和属性的每个标头。To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the property for each item and the property for each header. 然后可以添加、 删除和重新排列中的标头集合以获得所需的结果。You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the collection to achieve the desired result. 若要控制平铺视图中的图块的大小，设置属性。To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the property. 这可用于子项文本太长，单个行时防止自动换行。This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line. 磁贴视图的示例，请参阅属性。For an example of the tile view, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 虽然详细信息视图中仅显示列，但没有列标题的子项将不会显示在详细信息视图或磁贴视图中。Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view. 当你的应用程序调用时，磁贴视图是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用方法。The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，任何与磁贴视图相关的代码都不起作用，且 控件将显示在大图标视图中。On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the control displays in the large icon view. 因此，取决于磁贴视图的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly. 你可能想要编写代码来确定磁贴视图是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，当使用所有者描述的外观进行自定义磁贴视图中的项，你可能想要使用绘图代码适用于大图标视图磁贴视图不支持的操作系统上运行时。For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view. 平铺视图功能是由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不位于虚拟模式下，事件发生一次。If the is not in virtual mode, the event will occur. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`放入置于虚拟模式。Setting the property to `true` puts the into virtual mode. 在虚拟模式下，普通集合是未使用。In Virtual mode, the normal collection is unused. 相反，对象作为动态创建需要它们。Instead, objects are created dynamically as the requires them. 虚拟模式可以是在许多情况下有用。Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances. 如果必须从已在内存中，非常大集合填充对象创建对象的每一项可以是一种浪费。If a object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a object for each entry can be wasteful. 虚拟模式下，在创建了所需项。In virtual mode, only the items required are created. 在其他情况下，值对象可能需要通常情况下，重新计算，对整个集合也这样做会产生不可接受的性能。In other cases, the values of the objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance. 虚拟模式下，在计算中所需的项目。In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated. 若要使用的虚拟模式，你必须处理事件，每次引发需要一项。In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the event, which is raised every time the requires an item. 此事件处理程序应创建所属的指定索引处的对象。This event handler should create the object that belongs at the specified index. 此外，属性必须设置为虚拟列表的大小。In addition, the property must be set to the size of the virtual list. 处理事件使在虚拟模式中搜索。Handling the event enables searching in virtual mode. 如果不处理此事件，和方法将返回`null`。If this event is not handled, the and methods will return `null`. 你可以处理事件以维护的缓存对象。You can handle the event in order to maintain a cache of objects. 如果计算或查找，可创建对象是占用大量资源，维护缓存可以提高性能。If the calculation or lookup to create a object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance. 如果属性设置为，值将自动更改为时设置为`true`。If the property is set to , the value will automatically be changed to when is set to `true`. 在虚拟模式下，禁用收集。In virtual mode, the collection is disabled. 尝试访问它相对于。Attempting to access it results in an . 这同样适用的集合和集合。The same is true of the collection and the collection. 如果你想要检索的所选的或已选中的项，使用和集合相反。If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the and collections instead. ## Examples 此示例演示了一个简单其内容是首先一万个平方值。This example illustrates a simple whose contents are the first ten thousand squares. 它处理搜索，并使用缓存来提高性能。It handles searching and uses a cache for increased performance.
